description: This file defines a Java interface for a Spring Data JPA repository managing UserEntity objects, providing data access methods including a custom finder by identification number.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for UserEntity entities, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and custom finder method.

methods.name: findByIdentificationNumber
methods.description: Custom query method to retrieve a UserEntity by its identification number, returning an Optional container.
